ProjectTitle: Walking the lines of engineering, biology and medicine: Creating 3D human neuromuscular junctions to evaluate novel therapies for neurodegenerative diseases
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/04/2023
Please note that you used an older DMP template, BOF now uses the Flemish standard DMP template that you can find in DMPonline.be. Please use this template for your future DMPs. 
Please remove information that is not relevant for your project from the DMP, using te digital vault for example is not needed if you are not collecting sensitive personal data. 
Under sharing please describe how you will share data underlying your publication, which repositories are you considering to use? You can find more information here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
